system.description:
This version of Arcane Background (Sorcerer) replaces the version presented in the Fantasy Companion.

  • Requirements: Spirit d6+

  • Arcane Skill: Spellcasting (Spirit)

  • Starting Powers: Three powers chosen from the list below.

  • Starting Power Points: 15

  • Available Powers: Arcane protection, banish, barrier, beast friend, blast, blind, bolt, boost/lower Trait, burrow, burst, confusion, conjure item, curse, damage field, darksight, deflection, detect/conceal arcana, disguise, dispel, divination, drain Power Points, elemental manipulation, empathy, entangle, environmental protection, farsight, fear, fly, growth/shrink, havoc, illusion, intangibility, invisibility, light/darkness, locate, lock/unlock, mystic intervention, object reading, planar binding, plane shift, protection, puppet, scrying, shape change, sloth/speed, slumber, smite, sound/silence, speak language, stun, summon ally, summon monster, telekinesis, teleport, time stop, wall walker, warriorâ€™s gift, wish.

  • Armor Interference (Major): Bulky armor interferes with the somatic gestures sorcerers use to cast their spells. Sorcerers have the @UUID[Compendium.swade-fantasy-companion.swade-fc-hindrances.Item.g78Sft2Y46sxY5z3]{Armor Interference} (Major) Hindrance.

  • Components: Sorcerers make use of miscellaneous material components to cast their spells. Thus, they have the @UUID[Compendium.swade-fantasy-companion.swade-fc-hindrances.Item.MykOIqoms17ugdwa]{Material Components} Hindrance.

  • Metamagic: The magic inherently flowing through sorcerers allows them to manipulate spontaneously the effects of their spells more easily. Sorcerers can reduce the cost of a common Modifier (see @UUID[Compendium.swade-fantasy-companion.swade-fc.JournalEntry.swadefcp04arcana.JournalEntryPage.04activation0000#power-modifiers]{Power Modifiers} in the Fantasy Companion) by 1 Power Point a number of times per day equal to their Rank (e.g., one for Novice, two for Seasoned, five for Legendary). This ability can be used only once per encounter.
